rules_text:
Suspend 3–{4}{W}{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {4}{W}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Whenever a time counter is removed from Emanation of Angels while it’s exiled, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
